alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Marion; Marshall; Polk; Story; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 7:46PM CDT until April 23 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Polk County in central Iowa... Southeastern Story County in central Iowa... Southwestern Marshall County in central Iowa... Northern Marion County in south central Iowa... Jasper County in central Iowa... Eastern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ankeny to near Carlisle to 11 miles south of Indianola, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Des Moines, Ankeny, Newton, Altoona, Pella, Pleasant Hill, Carlisle, Bondurant, Saylorville, Mitchellville, Colfax, Monroe, Pleasantville, Prairie City, Baxter, Adventureland Amusement Park, Iowa Speedway, Prairie Meadows, Iowa State Fairgrounds and Lake Red Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 87 and 97. Interstate 80 between mile markers 137 and 175. Interstate 235 between mile markers 11 and 14. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Jasper; Marion; Marshall; Polk; Story; Warren
